item.description:
Greetings! I'm delighted to help re-launch the Ex-Midwesterners Meetup group.

Awhile back I saw there was a need for an organizer and I figured .... what the heck! But .... I'll need your help! Many thanks to Steve Rosen who has already stepped up!

Rattlesnake is fun place and Steve has an area set aside for us. If it's nice, we can wander out to the deck.

If you're willing to help, here are a few things ...


  • Bring name tags - my thought is to include your first name and where in the Midwest you're from or went to school.
  • Help with check-in - I don't want it to be too formal, but I do want people to feel welcome!
  • Scout out for events, locations, etc. that would be suitable for a gathering


As you'll see from the revised description, my motto is: Conversations first, business cards later!

Let's just relax, have a fun gathering and get to know some other displaced NICE people! :-)

I look forward to seeing you on the 23rd!

If you have any ideas of events, locations, etc. would you please contact Steve Rosen
item.name: Re-launch of Boston Ex-Midwesterners - please join us!
